content: these adorable acorn lanterns are knit entirely in the round from the bottom up on dpns the candle is embroidered on using a chain stitch the bottom has been left open so that they can stand independently and so the embroidery is easier to do i hope they bring joy to make a lantern with a real acorn lid click here 2 hope you enjoy this free pattern happy knitting natasha > **praise for acorn lantern** > > very cute and quick knit i absolutely > love it adente 3 > > what a perfect little lantern > 5kittens 4 > > tiny scraps of yarn used very cute > little lantern just right for a > mouse bogwoppit 5 > > lovely written pattern less than an > hour to knit bikerhen 6 > > cute little lantern good for > decoration of all kind > saphiera 7 > > scraps used- sweet little lantern > thrsedge 8 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/winter-1284 2 https //www ravelry com/projects/tashahanson/acorn-lantern-2 3 https //www ravelry com/projects/adente/laterne-laterne 4 https //www ravelry com/projects/5kittens/test-nh-5jrey4 5 https //www ravelry com/projects/bogwoppit/acorn-test 6 https //www ravelry com/projects/bikerhen/acorn-lantern-test 7 https //www ravelry com/projects/saphiera/acorn-lantern-test 8 https //www ravelry com/projects/thrsedge/acorn-lantern-test
